help_text.welcome: Welcome to ConClár. You can use the checkboxes next to programme items to make a personal schedule. You can view this on the My Schedule page, and share to other devices.
help_text.sharing: You may share your personal schedule to other devices using the QR codes on the My Schedule page.

my_schedule.title: My Schedule

empty.text: This page will show your personal convention schedule. To activate it, click the checkboxes next to items you are interested in on the programme page. Your selected items will be listed on this page. You may also share items between devices on this page by scanning the QR code that will be shown at the bottom the page, or copying the link.

my_schedule.intro: Your personal schedule is shown below. It is not automatically synced with other devices, but you can use the links or QR codes at the bottom of this page to share your selections to your other devices.

share.label: Share program selection
share.description: Copy and paste this link to share your selections with other devices. Or point your camera at the QR code below.
share.multiple_description: Because you have selected a large number of items, you will need to use multiple links/QR codes to transfer to your other devices.

shared.title: Shared Program Items
shared.description: The following programme items have been shared with you. To add to your schedule, click the button at the bottom of the page.

convention_time.notice: Convention time for @timezone, shown in bold.

local_time.notice: Local time for @timezone, shown in italics.
local_time.failure: Unable to convert to local time.

show_local_time.label: Show local time
show_local_time.differs_label: Display if differs from convention time

show_timezone.label: Show timezone after times
show_timezone.if_local_label: Show timezone if local time shown

dark_mode.label: Dark mode (may require refresh after changing)
